name: Gun Modifications
entries: At 3rd level, you learn how to craft modifications for your guns. Firearms can have varying numbers of modifications applied to them, which is detailed in the Firearms list. It takes 1 minute to apply or remove a Modification from a Firearm. You learn 4 modifications, and learn more as you progress in the class. Each Firearm you wield can benefit from an additional number of Modifications equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
If you apply modifications to a Firearm, only you (or another creature that knows how to craft those modifications) can benefit from them. Below are your possible modifications.
